text: Va [ej pajomʙar] az tu dar ʙorai hajz [odati mohonai zanon] mepursand, ʙigu: "On [holat] nav'i norohati ast; pas, dar holati qoidagi az zanon kanoragiri kuned va ʙo onon nazdiki nakuned, to pok savand. Pas, hangome ki pok sudand [va ƣusl kardand], az hamon coje, ki Alloh taolo ʙa sumo farmon dodaast, ʙo eson omezis kuned. Ba rosti, ki Alloh taolo tavʙakunandagonro dust medorad va pokizagonro [niz] dust medorad
